description: Iodine is a dark, lustrous solid that readily forms violet vapors. It is essential for human health, supporting thyroid function through hormone production. Medical applications include disinfectants, imaging agents, and antiseptics. In industry, iodine appears in catalysts, pharmaceuticals, and specialized materials. Its ability to bond with organic compounds makes it valuable in synthetic chemistry. Though not abundant, iodine is widely used in both health and technology.
name: Iodine
